content:
as December begins and the quarter comes to an end here at the Nexus we want to reflect on  PERIOD While most of it may have seemed like a cruel joke or a nonsensical dream one thing that can always be relied upon to seem right in the world is food PERIOD
On The Menu went back in time through the depths of Pinterest Instagram Google search results and hipster food blogs to reveal the biggest food trends by month in  PERIOD In case you missed the hype or want to reflect on your culinary decisions here is a compiled list of the most popular foods of the past year PERIOD

Collin McLeod  Daily Nexus

December 
Okay I know I just said that this list was trends of  but lets face it A lot of rapid change happened after the November  election and with that being said I feel like our journey begins here with empanadas PERIOD The delicious savory pastry pockets come in a variety of flavors making them adaptable to many different culinary backgrounds PERIOD Plenty of places have taken on the grabandgo simplicity of these Latin treats and applied their own artisanal spin on them PERIOD Locally you can pick some up at Tangonadas downtown PERIOD

Nicole Wallace  Daily Nexus

January  
For anyone with any sort of appreciation of Vietnamese cuisine you may be saying what the pho to this next pick PERIOD But for those unaware this noodle dish and its aromatic broth blew up in a big way at the beginning of this year PERIOD Although it was an already trendy meal there was an explosion of social media posts about athome adaptations of the traditional dish in that first cold month of  PERIOD You can get your pho on at Saigon Noodle House near Kmart or in your backyard at Pho Bistro PERIOD

Nicole Wallace  Daily Nexus

February  
Matcha is one of those things that I have been intimidated by PERIOD Hearing those perfectly puttogether sorority girls order their matcha lattes while I grunt out an order for black iced coffee in my sweatpants and last nights leftover eyeliner has made me as bitter as my drink PERIOD But matcha became a staple in coffee and tea houses this year PERIOD Not only is it super good for you but its an aesthetically pleasing pale green PERIOD Pick up a matcha green tea latte at Caje to make you feel better about yourself for finals week PERIOD

Nicole Wallace  Daily Nexus

March 
Just a walk down the snack aisle at TJs will tell you that veggie chips are in PERIOD If it grew from the earth and is remotely considered vegan then by God the manufacturers are going to thinly slice fry and salt it so they can throw it in some packaging and tell you its a chip PERIOD And this year we ate it up literally PERIOD Those alternative chips flew off the shelves with their peak season in March PERIOD Might I suggest a bag of the classic Inner Peas They may be contested as a true to form chip but lets be honest if it isnt a potato is it really a chip

Kelsey Ferrera  Daily Nexus

April  
This year I think we were all desperate for a little escape from reality and maybe thats why we made everything look like a fucking unicorn PERIOD From lattes to cupcakes to god damn cream cheese on toast and popcorn PERIOD We slapped pastel pinks purples blues and edible glitter on anything that couldnt run fast enough PERIOD While I appreciate the creativity Im not an advocate of consuming fictional beings and hope this trend stays in  PERIOD If you need one last magical meal try the unicorn hot chocolate recipe from cookiesandcups.com

Jenny Luo  Daily Nexus

May 
Isla Vista may have jumped on the band wagon late with this one by just opening up two poke restaurants in the last few months but that is simply a testament to the popularity of the raw fish bowls PERIOD It seems as if this trend is here to stay and has already formed its own cult following and fusion adaptations PERIOD Youll be seeing an exponential growth of the poke scene PERIOD Try out our two new Isla Vista poke stops at Poke Ceviche and PokiRito PERIOD

Jenny Luo  Daily Nexus

June  
Although tacos have stood the test of time and will likely always be popular especially in our beautiful state of California there has been a taco takeover in the culinary world so to speak PERIOD It seems that one positive thing from this past election has been a need for awareness and a sense of unity amongst cultures and groups targeted by the executive branch PERIOD A Mexican classic that allows for variation and adaptations the taco has become a staple in restaurants as humble as mom and pops to fivestar culinary legends PERIOD To feel united with our cousins south of the border try the famous Lilys Tacos in the Kmart plaza open every day except Tuesday PERIOD

Courtesy of wikimedia.org

July 
This trend was one that I seemed to have missed entirely although Pinterest sure didnt PERIOD In case you were looking for an alternative barbecuing option then jackfruit is your guy PERIOD Used as a substitute for pulled pork and other piggy plates the hearty fruit definitely raises some eyebrows PERIOD Try this recipe for Kentuckyfried jackfruit from theveglife.com

Nicole Wallace  Daily Nexus

August 
For years the green on the scene was kale but thats old news now PERIOD Many veg heads have opted for more aromatic and interesting greens PERIOD Those like mustard greens arugula watercress chard and curly endive have hypnotized the masses with their nutritional benefits PERIOD Anything from green smoothies to salads the health gods have spoken and kale just simply isnt enough PERIOD Try Mesa Verdes strawberry asparagus salad for your next dinner PERIOD

Jenny Luo  Daily Nexus

September  
Yes I know avocado has consistently been a trend since idk the early 2000s Yet here we are just as mesmerized as ever by this creamy green fruit PERIOD The California Avocado Festival which happens at the end of September or early October doesnt help us calm down much either and so all month our Instagram feeds are filled with avocado roses guacamole done  different ways and of course every variation of avocado toast that has ever been thought of PERIOD Ever PERIOD So go ahead get the guac even though you know its extra at least youre on trend PERIOD

Nicole Wallace  Daily Nexus

October 
Another trend that simply skyrocketed was the grain bowl PERIOD Every natural food blog or weight loss enthusiast has posted about these nutritious buildyourown bowls PERIOD Starting with quinoa or brown rice and then a healthy mound of greens fruits veggies legumes and sometimes meat these bowls are super customizable and easy meals for every appetite PERIOD Try the Quinoa KeenWhat at Kyles Kitchen PERIOD

Nicole Wallace  Daily Nexus

November 
The latest trend has been a favorite of coop queens and counterculture kids for years but has since become a mainstream staple PERIOD The fermented concoction is boasting probiotic benefits and pungent flavors making it the new powerhouse potion for those looking to cleanse their inner chakras PERIOD Pick up a bottle of HealthAde Kombucha in pomegranate flavor at the Isla Vista Food CoOp PERIOD
Print

Comments are closed PERIOD

Vaccines

Daily

Cases

Source California Health
			and
			Human Services Agency

Forgetting to take off the ratty AF1s at the potluck most Asian households dont take kindly to shoes in the house

Wearing your only red tshirt to every final Red is a lucky color in many cultures especially Chinese cultures

Putting spiders in your friends wedding dress for good luck Has its origins in old english folklore and represents abundance for the couple

Accidentally summoned a ghost by leaving their chopsticks straight up A superstition that has Chinese origins because the chopsticks are reminiscent of funeral incense

Didnt like your friends significant other so they gifted them an umbrella The word for umbrella san sounds like the word for divorce in Chinese

Believing in horoscopes The modern western zodiac actually came from Babylonian astrology

Walked backwards in Portugal to live out the Faust fantasy In Portugal walking backwards allows the devil to know exactly where you are

Stole a raven from the tower of london as reparations According to UK superstition if there arent  ravens in the tower the kingdom will fall

Breaks a knuckle knocking on wood for good scores on finals Knocking on wood may have originated from the Celts and their love for tree spirits

Drunkenly rearranging their apartment for the feng shui at  AM A Chinese cultural practice that harmonizes a person with the energies of the environment around them

Left out their middle name on their taxes because the Fae run the IRS Giving the Fae your full name gives them power over you and the IRS has too much

Hit by a car but the license plate had an angel number Beyond just blowing up on TikTok angel numbers were invented by.. PERIOD Pythagoras
title: #trends: Look Back on the Most Popular Food Fads For Every Month of 2017 | The Daily Nexus
name: University of California Santa Barbara
